content: गुल्मः, --ल्मं [गुड् मक् डस्य लः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A clump or cluster of trees, a thicket, wood, bush; <ls>Ms. 1. 48</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 192</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">12. 58</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 229.</ls> {@--2@} A troop of soldiers, a division of an army, consisting of 45 foot, 27 horse, 9 chariots and 9 elephants. {@--3@} A fort. {@--4@} The spleen. {@--5@} A chronic enlargement of the spleen. {@--6@} A village police-station. {@--7@} A wharf of stairs (<ab>Mar.</ab> घांट). {@--8@} Disciplining an army, keeping it in a posture of defence. --ल्मी {@--1@} A cluster or clump of trees. {@--2@} Jujube. {@--3@} Small cardamoms. {@--4@} A tent.

गुल्मः, --ल्मं [गुड् मक् डस्य लः <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A clump or cluster of trees, a thicket, wood, bush; <ls>Ms. 1. 48</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">7. 192</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">12. 58</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 229.</ls> {@--2@} A troop of soldiers, a division of an army, consisting of 45 foot, 27 horse, 9 chariots and 9 elephants. {@--3@} A fort. {@--4@} The spleen. {@--5@} A chronic enlargement of the spleen. {@--6@} A village police-station. {@--7@} A wharf of stairs (<ab>Mar.</ab> घांट). {@--8@} Disciplining an army, keeping it in a posture of defence. --ल्मी {@--1@} A cluster or clump of trees. {@--2@} Jujube. {@--3@} Small cardamoms. {@--4@} A tent.
